governance_queries.default: I'm your Governance AI Assistant. I can help with complaint tracking, analytics, resource allocation, and policy insights. What would you like to know?

chat_responses: Based on the current governance data, I can provide detailed insights. What specific area would you like to explore?
I've analyzed the patterns in your jurisdiction. Here are the key findings...

transcriptions.water_supply: No water supply in our area since last two days. Ward 12, Street number 5. Very urgent issue, please help.
transcriptions.electricity: Frequent power cuts happening every evening between 6 to 9 PM. Affecting students during study time.
transcriptions.road_repair: Large pothole near the school gate is very dangerous. Many accidents have happened. Please repair urgently.
transcriptions.health_center: Primary health center lacks basic medicines. Doctor is also not available most days.
transcriptions.sanitation: Garbage has not been collected for one week. Creating health hazard in our locality.
